text: Desmond Connell (24 March 1926 – 21 February 2017) was an Irish cardinal in the Roman Catholic Church. He was an Archbishop of Dublin and Primate of Ireland. Cardinal Connell was one of a number of senior clergy to have been heavily criticized for inaction and for making misleading statements in connection with clerical sex abuse in Dublin. ==Other websites== *Grant of arms of His Eminence Desmond Connell, Archbishop of Dublin *Desmond Cardinal Connell (Catholic-Hierarchy) *Report by Commission of Investigation into Catholic Archdiocese of Dublin *College of Cardinals. Biographical notes. title: Desmond Connell
